mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMM_LIKES (ID, MEMBER_ID, POST_ID) VALUES (SEQ_COMM_LIKES.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{postId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_COMM_LIKES WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT TP.ID, TP.POST_TITLE, TP.POST_CONTENT, TP.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_COMM_LIKES TCL JOIN TBL_POST TP ON TCL.POST_ID = TP.ID WHERE TCL.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
